snippet.title: Sam Jain (Fareportal CEO) : Experience with A.I. chatbots like Amber in HR
snippet.description:
Sam Jain, Founder & CEO at Fareportal, the 2nd largest online travel agency in America, shares his success story with A.I. chatbots like https://amber.infeedo.com

Fareportal/CheapOair just got recognised among the first 10 companies in India to successfully engage employees and predict attrition using A.I. in HR.

------

Subscribe to our channel to hear more from industry leaders about their experience using AI tools like Amber.

Like and Share this video to help spread the word of AI in your network.

Check out what other industry leaders have to say about their experience using AI in their HR here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CHGKrDphHsY&list=PLI0Ij8m4WgiMa-rmhBmZ4Cv84tHtuLzJ1

------

Companies like GE, Makemytrip, Airtel, Dominos and more are currently using Amber to help retain top talent while enhancing employee experience.

Amber is a smart A.I. assistant who talks to people in an organisation and enables CEOs and HR leaders to proactively help people who are unhappy or about to leave.

Amber is the only secure chatbot in this world that “asks” relevant questions to learn employee sentiment at crucial milestones in their lifecycle at the company whereas other bots can only “answer” queries.

------

To stay updated about all things Amber, connect on social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/infeedo
Blog: https://blog.infeedo.com

Let us know what you think about AI tools like Amber being used in HR down in the comments.
